description: End-to-end purchase management workflow for a manufacturing company covering requisition, approvals, sourcing, purchase order issuance, supplier confirmation, logistics, goods receipt, quality inspection, invoice processing, and payment closure. The primary workflow sheet tracks each purchase request/PO lifecycle with sequential stages, planned vs actual milestone dates, and delay calculations.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Purchase Workflow ID
columns.description: Unique workflow identifier for the purchase lifecycle record

columns.name: Current Stage Number
columns.description: System-maintained current stage number for the workflow

columns.name: Overall Status
columns.description: Overall workflow status (e.g., Open/In Progress/On Hold/Closed/Cancelled)

columns.name: Owner User ID
columns.description: Primary owner responsible for driving the workflow

columns.name: Created By User ID
columns.description: User who created the workflow record

columns.name: Last Updated By User ID
columns.description: User who last updated the workflow record

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Stage 1 delay in days (e.g., Actual1-Planned1 when both present)

columns.name: PlantWarehouse
columns.description: Plant or warehouse where material is required

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which material/service is required

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total value (Quantity x Estimated Unit Price)

columns.name: Delay2
columns.description: Stage 2 delay in days (e.g., Actual2-Planned2 when both present)

columns.name: Approval Level
columns.description: Approval level based on delegation of authority

columns.name: Delay3
columns.description: Stage 3 delay in days (e.g., Actual3-Planned3 when both present)

columns.name: Vendors Invited
columns.description: Comma-separated vendor IDs or reference to invited list

columns.name: Delay4
columns.description: Stage 4 delay in days (e.g., Actual4-Planned4 when both present)

columns.name: Approval Reference if required
columns.description: Reference to any additional approval for vendor finalization

columns.name: Delay5
columns.description: Stage 5 delay in days (e.g., Actual5-Planned5 when both present)

columns.name: PO Total Value
columns.description: Total PO value including taxes/charges as applicable

columns.name: Delay6
columns.description: Stage 6 delay in days (e.g., Actual6-Planned6 when both present)

columns.name: Supplier Contact Person
columns.description: Supplier contact person for this PO

columns.name: DeviationException Notes
columns.description: Notes on deviations from PO terms

columns.name: Delay7
columns.description: Stage 7 delay in days (e.g., Actual7-Planned7 when both present)

columns.name: Delay8
columns.description: Stage 8 delay in days (e.g., Actual8-Planned8 when both present)

columns.name: ShortExcess Quantity
columns.description: Difference between ordered and received quantity

columns.name: Storekeeper User ID
columns.description: User ID of storekeeper who processed inward

columns.name: Delay9
columns.description: Stage 9 delay in days (e.g., Actual9-Planned9 when both present)

columns.name: Delay10
columns.description: Stage 10 delay in days (e.g., Actual10-Planned10 when both present)

columns.name: Invoice Received Date
columns.description: Date invoice was received by accounts

columns.name: DebitCredit Note Reference
columns.description: Reference to debit/credit note if issued

columns.name: Delay11
columns.description: Stage 11 delay in days (e.g., Actual11-Planned11 when both present)

columns.name: Payment Due Date
columns.description: Due date for payment as per terms

columns.name: Delay12
columns.description: Stage 12 delay in days (e.g., Actual12-Planned12 when both present)

stages.stage_description: Initiation of demand by user/department with item/service details, quantity, required date, and justification.
Approval workflow for PR based on value/department rules; captures approver decision and comments.
RFQ issuance to vendors and collection of quotations with validity and lead time details.
Commercial/technical evaluation, negotiation, and final vendor selection with comparative statement reference.
Creation of PO with terms, taxes, delivery details and internal approval prior to release to supplier.
Supplier confirms PO acceptance, committed delivery date, and any deviations.
Shipment dispatch details, transporter info, tracking, and expected arrival.

stages.stage_name: Goods Receipt Note GRN  Store Inward
stages.stage_description: Receipt of goods/services, inward entry, quantity verification, and GRN creation.
Quality check against specifications; acceptance, rejection, or conditional acceptance with NCR reference.
Invoice receipt and validation against PO and GRN (3-way match), including tax validation and discrepancy handling.
Payment proposal, approvals, and payment execution with transaction reference and date.
Final closure of purchase with supplier performance review and documentation completeness check.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the complete lifecycle of each purchase from PR to closure with sequential stages and milestone tracking.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Master data for materials/services used in purchasing with codes, descriptions, and default attributes.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Supplier master data including compliance and payment details.

sheets.name: PlantWarehouse Master
sheets.description: Reference list of plants and warehouses for delivery/receipt locations.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Cost center reference for charging purchases.

sheets.name: GL Account Master
sheets.description: General ledger accounts for accounting classification.

sheets.name: Tax Code Master
sheets.description: Tax codes and rates used for purchasing and invoicing.

sheets.name: Incoterms Master
sheets.description: Incoterms reference list for delivery terms.

sheets.name: Currency Master
sheets.description: Currency reference list for PO and invoice values.

sheets.name: UserEmployee Master
sheets.description: Reference list of employees/users for requestor/approver/owner lookups (separate from authentication).

sheets.name: Dropdowns - Purchase Workflow
sheets.description: Centralized dropdown/reference values for consistent data entry across the workflow.

sheets.name: Import Dump - Purchase Transactions
sheets.description: Optional dump/import sheet for bulk upload from ERP/email extracts; data is validated and then mapped into the Purchase Workflow Register.
